Network systems and data analysts, and medical scientists are the fastest growing occupations, but, despite the focus on`` knowledge'' jobs, the great majority of job openings will be in the low tech, non-professional positions, in jobs such as personal and home care aides, retail salespersons, cashiers, waiters and waitresses, and food preparation workers, Bernick concludes. In a lengthy section on the administration's treatment of wartime detainees, Donald Rumsfeld regrets not leaving office in May 2004, after the Abu Ghraib prison scandal erupted, The Washington Post said. Looking back, I see there are things the administration could have done differently and better with respect to wartime detention, Donald Rumsfeld acknowledges.( Reporting by JoAnne Allen, editing by Eric Beech) href="http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Post-Chronicle/118032884888798" title="The Post Chronicle" target="_TOP">

said he's spoken to Eagles quarterback Michael Vick several times in the past few weeks. Michael Vick was reinstated during the 2009 season after spending 18 months in prison on federal charges of running a dogfighting ring. He's paid a very significant price and he's doing the right thing, Roger Goodell said.`` I don't want him to put himself in a position where bad things can happen around him. He takes that seriously. `` At the end of the day, we ultimately believed that where our little family is led is somewhere in the service of the people of Indiana in the days ahead,'' Mike Pence said. I've learned in decisions like these to follow my heart. My heart is in Indiana. Text of letter from Mike Pence to supporters Over the past few months, my family and I have been grateful for the encouragement we have received to consider other opportunities to serve our state

million contract. Show supremo Simon Cowell is excited to be offering the biggest guaranteed prize in television history, and has also revealed the programme will welcome audionees aged from just 12. He said: I like the idea that a 12 year old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group.`` I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent, and we are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5m recording contract. I'm doing this show in America because I genuinely believe we can find a superstar. away from the WarRio Ferdinandrs with an 11-2 run to open the quarter and actually kept their double-digit lead for most of the rest of the game.`` It felt like we turned that corner,'' Allen Iverson said. We just did everything right at the end. I think Chris Webber did a great job at the end. We ran the offense through him and he made some great things happen. Chris Webber and Allen Iverson combined for 50 of the Sixers' 84 shots and made 25 of the 42 field goals. While Allen Iverson scored 24 points in the first half, Chris Webber followed with 15 in the second.``

a massive, massive risk, but also it's an incredible incentive,'' he said.`` I also did it because I believe[ we] can find a star,'' Simon Cowell continued. So, I'm nervous, but I'm also confident that it was the right thing to do. I think it should be a life-changing prize. This is not a dressed-up 5 million. The British media mogul, who will also be serving as executive producer and a judge on the show, noted that the money will be paid out over five years, one million for each year,
